name: Jimmy_Stewart
text:
Jimmy Stewart
Jimmy Stewart was an actor.
In 1967, thirteen-year-old Dale Cooper had a poster on his wall of Stewart in the film The FBI Story. Cooper referred to the poster as his "most important personal item" and forbid anyone else to touch it.
Behind the scenes
James Stewart (May 20, 1908 – July 2, 1997) was an American film actor and military officer who was primarily known for his film appearances of the 1940s and 1950s. His most famous films include It's a Wonderful Life (1946), Rear Window (1954), and Vertigo (1958).
